text:
Ordered five items and there was a mixed reaction.  The fried fish and chicken teriyaki was a nice portion and the fish was nicely fried.

The oyaka don and the beef don also had a lot of rice but the amount if meat and egg could be improved.

The salmon and pork katsu bento was okay though the fish was smaller than expected.

Tastewise, most of the dishes were okay.
Economic rice promo of 2 veg 1 meat at sgd2 and 2 meat 1 at sgd2.50 as shown on their standee under the food loft signage is fake promo. Buyer's beware
Typical Singapore local food store which offer wide variety of famous local foods.

Local styled coffee shop with Halal section. Worst vendor is the veggie rice stall with their inconsistent quality. Beware their prices that vary from day to day; count you change before you walk away with your food!! I rate them ½ ☆ /10.
Best value for money would be the Ban Mian stall. Rating 8 ☆/10.

Do note they do not blend any more juices around 9plus pm . They will simply refuse your request at all cost . I just wanted to get a cup of celery juice for a high bp person but they stand firm on the ground . They refuse to sell saying no more blending of juices at thjs hour . Do take note not to ordee juices during this timing
